definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: With the original process, the qualification rate of the liquation carbonide was only 75.
sentences.chinese: 原工藝下液析碳化物合格率僅爲75。

sentences.english: Eutectic carbide in cast high speed steel M2 presents a network distribution.
sentences.chinese: M2鑄造高速鋼中共晶碳化物呈網狀分佈。

sentences.english: Dow Chemicals later took over Union Carbide.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，陶氏化學接手聯合碳化物公司。

sentences.english: The structure and mechanical performance of bainite without carbide are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了無碳化物貝氏體的組織與機械性能。

sentences.english: USES: As raw marerial in producing other Ce compounds.
sentences.chinese: 鋼中固溶的鈰原子在鈰碳化物界面區發生偏聚。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the granular carbides formation from hot deformation in high chromium cast steel.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討了熱變形高鉻鑄鋼中顆粒狀碳化物的形成。

sentences.english: Through the carbide layer, metallurgical binding is produced between matrix materials and diamond.
sentences.chinese: 通過碳化物層，胎體材料與金剛石之間產生冶金結合。

sentences.english: Dislocation pile-up and tangling around carbide particles were also observed after high degree of deformation.
sentences.chinese: 變形量大時在碳化物粒子周圍形成位錯塞積和纏結。

sentences.english: We think that the bulk of these extra CFCs are coming from things like old fridges.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲這大量多餘的氟氯碳化物來自舊家店。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
